snippet: After Kelly Smith was fouled during a game, she went online to chastise her opponent, and that act has gotten Smith in hot water.
lead_paragraph: After Kelly Smith was fouled during a game, she went online to chastise her opponent, and that act has gotten Smith in hot water.

headline.main: English Player May Face a Bigger Problem: Lashing Out After Her Injury
headline.print_headline: 2 Games, and 2 Different Outcomes for Similar Fouls
